mapper.select: select t.trainId,t.trainNo, ts.stations, ts.size from trainSearch ts, train t where stations regexp #{pattern} and ts.trainId=t.trainId

select t.trainId,t.trainNo, ts.stations, ts.size from trainsearch ts, sch, train t where ts.stations regexp #{sqlPattern} and ts.trainId=sch.trainId and t.trainId=ts.trainId and sch.station regexp #{start} and sch.start>date_add(now(), interval 30 minute) order by sch.start
